item.title: Bootcamp Day 1
item.description: Instruction What are we going to do this week? Why did you sign up? What do you want to learn? What will you be able to do at the end of the week? Learning How to Use Pop!_OS Connect to WiFi Open Firefox. There are three ways to open any application on Pop!_OS: Use the Launcher (recommended method): Press the SUPER key, which is usually is the Windows or âŒ˜/Command/Cmd key (recommended method) Click the launcher icon in the Dock Select Applications in the upper left corner Open it from the dock (if it is shown there) Visit willston.
